EmailTemplate.name: Chatter Bot Post Message Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Chatter Bot Post Message Template Subject Is Ignored
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations, you've just received a Chatter post by Chatter Bot!

 

Here are some things to know:

 

@ mentions

  1. Chatter messages support @ mentions by placing a Chatter User, Group, or Record ID between two curly brackets like this {userId}.
  2. When working with merge fields in an Email Template, the Object and Field names are enclosed between '{!' and '}' so you would still need to add one more set of { and } around that.
  3. Here's an example where we are @ mentioning your name {{!Chatter_Bot_Group_Member__c.MemberId__c}}

 

Rich Text Formatting

  • Chatter messages also support a subset of HTML tags to make rich text posts.
  • <p> starts a new paragraph </p>
  • <b> bold </b>
  • <i> italic </i>
  • <s> strikethrough </s>
  • <u> underline </u>
  • <ul> bulleted list </ul>
  • <ol> numbered list </ol>
  • <li> list item within a bulleted or numbered list </li>

 

Blank Lines

Since Chatter does not support the <br> break tag then you can use <p> </p> to create a blank paragraph with same effect.
